$Blue Peach (PAL, Rev1) [Wiifinity Gauntlet]
C21C51F0 00000005 
93A30008 3C608050 
38634ECC 2C1D0003 
4082000C 38800004 
48000008 3880001B 
90830000 00000000 
C21A34CC 00000003 
80BE0000 2C050005 
40A20008 38600000 
2C030000 00000000 
C208EEB4 00000003 
80BD0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000 
2C030000 00000000 
C2275070 00000003 
80BD0000 2C050005 
40A20008 38600000 
2C030000 00000000 
C22784A8 00000003 
80BC0000 2C050005 
40A20008 38600000 
2C030000 00000000
*Port by Feder
*With this version of the code peach only turns blue when playing against Mario/Luigi/Wario/Waluigi

$Blue Peach (PAL, Rev2) [Wiifinity Gauntlet]
C21C54A0 00000005
93A30008 3C608050
3863544C 2C1D0003
4082000C 38800004
48000008 3880001B
90830000 00000000
C21A39CC 00000003
80BE0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000
C208F188 00000003
80BD0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000
C2275390 00000003
80BD0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000
C2278734 00000003
80BC0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000
*With this version of the code peach only turns blue when playing against Mario/Luigi/Wario/Waluigi

$Blue Peach (NTSC-U) [Wiifinity Gauntlet] 
C21C5E78 00000005
93A30008 3C608050
38635B5C 2C1D0003
4082000C 38800004
48000008 3880001B
90830000 00000000
C21A4278 00000003
80BE0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000
C208F4C0 00000003
80BD0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000
C22768EC 00000003
80BD0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000
C2279C90 00000003
80BC0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000
*With this version of the code peach only turns blue when playing against Mario/Luigi/Wario/Waluigi

93A30008 3C608050
38635F9C 2C1D0003
4082000C 38800004
48000008 3880001B
90830000 00000000

80BE0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000

80BD0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000

80BD0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000

80BC0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000

$Blue Peach (NTSC-K) [Wiifinity Gauntlet] 
C21C5ED4 00000005
93A30008 3C60804D
386305BC 2C1D0003
4082000C 38800004
48000008 3880001B
90830000 00000000
C21A4480 00000003
80BE0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000
C208F664 00000003
80BD0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000
C227B804 00000003
80BD0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000
C227EBA8 00000003
80BC0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000
2C030000 00000000
*With this version of the code peach only turns blue when playing against Mario/Luigi/Wario/Waluigi


CODE EXPLAINED:
# (We'll use the PAL Revision 1 version for this, but the logic is pretty much the same except for a few addresses)
C21C51F0 00000005 		# Start of ASM code 1
93A30008 3C608050 
38634ECC 2C1D0003 
4082000C 38800004 
48000008 3880001B 
90830000 00000000 
C21A34CC 00000003 		# Start of ASM code 2
80BE0000 2C050005 
40A20008 38600000 
2C030000 00000000 
C208EEB4 00000003 		# Start of ASM code 3
80BD0000 2C050005
40A20008 38600000 
2C030000 00000000 
C2275070 00000003 		# Start of ASM code 4
80BD0000 2C050005 
40A20008 38600000 
2C030000 00000000 
C22784A8 00000003 		# Start of ASM code 5
80BC0000 2C050005 
40A20008 38600000 
2C030000 00000000
# TODO: ASM code explanation
